person.defn: A named person entity must be the name of a person. Only first names, last names, and full names are considered named person entities. Any general reference to a person or people such as "woman", "CEO" and "high school student" is not a named entity. A named person entity should not have any starting titles such as "Professor" and "Dr.".
person.name: person

demos.sentence: CEO of Dubai-based company arrested for fraud.
demos.label: NA

demos.sentence: China's President Xi Jinping meets with South Korean leader for trade talks.
demos.label: CORRECT

demos.sentence: Professor David Johnson from Buenos Aires, Argentina, receives prestigious award from the National Society for the Gifted and Talented.
demos.label: WRONG_SPAN

demos.sentence: Indian Prime Minister to visit Berlin next week.
demos.label: NA

location.defn: A named location entity must be the name of a location. Any general reference to a location or locations such as "downtown area" and "community center" is not a named entity. Events like "Olympics" and "Fashion Week" are not relevant named entities.
location.name: location

demos.sentence: Celebrities flock to Paris Fashion Week for the latest trends.
demos.label: WRONG_SPAN

demos.sentence: The mayor of Manchester delivers a speech at the town hall.
demos.label: CORRECT

organization.defn: A named organization entity must be the name of an organization. Any general reference to an organization or organizations such as "non-profit organization", "foreign government", "high school" and "school district" is not a named entity. Adjectives such as "Indian", "European", "Israeli", and "Russian" are also not relevant named entities.
organization.name: organization

demos.sentence: Joe Biden holds talks with European leaders on climate change and global security.
demos.label: NA

demos.sentence: Environmental group launches campaign to protect Arctic Circle wildlife.
demos.label: NA

demos.sentence: Taiwanese startup revolutionizes the tech industry in Canada with innovative new app.
demos.label: NA

demos.sentence: Renowned Indian classical dancer performs at prestigious cultural event in Mumbai, India.
demos.label: NA
